column33: How did you hear about us?
column34: Please let us know where you heard about us?

column10: I was jogging and crossing the S George Mason Dr with 12 second left on the pedestrian crossing signal when three cars making a left turn from Four Mile Run Sr Service Rd cut me off. None of them stopped for me and the last car almost hit me. Allowing cars to make left turns during the same period as a pedestrian/bike crossing is a stupid idea.
